Guard: ^I'm looking for Loftwin Pearlblood. Have you seen him around?
GuardPhase2HALF: ^If you're looking into the mayor you could just tell me. He's been here recently, that's all I know anyway.
^Where can I get more to this story?
GuardPhase2: ^The mayor visited our store a while back, acting all secretive. If you want to know more, you should talk to Marcus.
GuardPhase3: ^Well, if you can pry him for that information anyway. The two are close-knit like a pair of lovers.
